text: Sebastian Hans Eli Fors (born 16 December 1990), known as Forsen, is a Swedish Twitch streamer who is known for playing Starcraft II and Hearthstone. He is also known for his fans, who call themselves "Forsenboys" or "Forsen Bajs" and have some involvement in making some internet memes popular. In January 2018, a warped image of Fors' face ("forsenE") became the most-used emote on Twitch worldwide. In late 2020, Forsen began a challenge with fellow streamer xQc to see who can have the fastest Minecraft speedrun.On December 20th 2023 Forsen beat xQc's record of 16:38 with a personal best of 15:28. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:Esports players
title: Forsen
